method.name: GET
method.doc: Get all logdb objects. There is always exactly one member.

param.name: Range:items={start}-{end}
param.doc: Range to limit the number of items retrieved.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: aclEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total eventstorage limit to allocate for ACL (NAP) Events.

param.name: atpEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total eventstorage limit to allocate for ATP Events.

param.name: comment
param.doc: Comment which describes the object (always the same, but localedependent).

param.name: ipsEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total eventstorage limit to allocate for IPS Events.

param.name: name
param.doc: Name of the object (always the same, but locale dependent).

param.name: sysEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total eventstorage limit to allocate for System events.
